title: Fight (Part 1)
body:
Fight (Part 1)

When Evan heard what the bald man was saying he knew his target was Valery.

His mind was running at full speed and he was thinking about how to get himself out of this situation.

But seeing his body condition he can't help but grumble.

His body was in a mess and he knew even if he uses mana reinforcement to 100% he won't be bald man's match.

"You are also coming with us" Evan come out from his thoughts hearing Carlos and his expression turned ugly.

While the bald man was sizing up Evan, Valery secretly took out a white crystal from her storage ring and injected her mana into it.

When the bald man felt fluctuations of mana he looked at Valery but his expression didn't change.

"Your communication crystal won't work here. I have already prepared everything in advance" Carlos said to Valery when he saw the crystal in her hand.

Valery who was Injecting mana into the crystal stopped because she can feel it was not working.
